column2: "Paul nye Silvanus nye Timoti dze kɛma Tesalonika asɔrasɔr a wɔwɔ hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest mu no;"
"adom nye asomdwee a ofir Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest hɔ nka hom."

column3: ɔsɛ hɛn dɛ yɛda Nyankopɔn ase daa wɔ hom ntsi
column6: na dɔ a hom nyina dze dodɔ homho nkorkor no adɔɔ so;"

column2: "na ɔma hɛnankasa so yɛhyehyɛ hɛnho wɔ hom mu wɔ Nyankopɔn asɔrasɔr mu wɔ hom abotar nye gyedzi a ɔwɔ hom ahohia nye amandzehu a hom rosɔw nyina mu ntsi;"
"ɔno na ɔyɛ Nyankopɔn atsɛn tsenenee sɛnkyerɛdze a ɔda gua
column3: ama woeebu hom dɛ hom sɛ Nyankopɔn ahendzi a hom ruhu ho amandze no."

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔtsen wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim dɛ ɔdze ahohia tua hɔn a wohiahia hom ho no kaw
column4: "na hom a worihiahia hom ho dze
column6: wɔ da bi a Ewuradze Jesus Kraest beyi noho efi sor
column10: na oebotua hɔn a wonnyim Nyankopɔn na wonntsie hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest asɛmpa no kaw."

column2: "ber a ɔbɛba ma wɔaahyɛ no enyimnyam wɔ n’ahotseweefo mu
column3: na wɔaahwɛ no dɛ anwanwadze wɔ hɔn a wɔgye dzi nyina mu
column4: osiandɛ wɔagye hɛn dasee a yedzii no wɔ hom mu no edzi wɔ da no mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi so na yɛsɔr ma hom daa dɛ
column3: hɛn Nyankopɔn mbu hom dɛ hom sɛ hom frɛ
column5: nye gyedzi edwuma no nyɛ ma wɔ hom mu;"

column2: "na wɔaahyɛ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus dzin enyimnyam wɔ hom mu
column3: nye hom so wɔ no mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest n’adom tse."
